md-extractor-path.name: Path to MD Asset extractor (Required)
md-extractor-path.description: I can't access Unity bundled assets without this, thus cannot import Muse Dash chart. There is probably an easier way to bridge between C# and C++ but I'm not an expert.

md-game-path.name: Path to Muse Dash Assets
md-game-path.description: If you have Muse Dash installed, put the game assets location here, usually found in (Muse Dash/MuseDash_Data/StreamingAssets/aa/StandaloneWindows64) then select StandaloneWindows64 folder. This is used for auto-detecting all Muse Dash music data.

md-prefetch-demo.name: Pre-extract Demo Music (not planned yet)
md-prefetch-demo.description: Requires MD Asset Viewer and Muse Dash Assets. Pre-extract Muse Dash Demo songs (or preview songs) so that you can browse freely (These thing take about 2,2 GB storage for all songs). remind me to change this into a custom button ,
